text: @Acosta #Republicans only thinking of themselves! We wear masks to protect others! Attendees should “self quarantine” for 2 weeks after attending to avoid passing #Covid_19 to their elderly family & “at risk” friends! @PressSec Kayleigh if u catch #COVID19 , DON’T PUT A DR’s LIFE @ RISK
